title: URBANopt Site
description: Schema for an URBANopt Site object

id.description: Unique id used to refer to this feature within this dataset, generated by database.

project_id.description: Project which this feature belongs to.

latitude.description: Latitude of site origin in WGS 84 coordinate system (deg)

longitude.description: Longitude of site origin in WGS 84 coordinate system (deg)

surface_elevation.description: The surface elevation (above NAVD88 datum) of the project (ft).

import_surrounding_buildings_as_shading.description: If true, import geometry from surrounding buildings when performing energy calculations.

timesteps_per_hour.description: Number of timesteps per hour for energy simulations.

begin_date.description: Date to begin simulation, format YYYY-MM-DD.

end_date.description: Date to end simulation, format YYYY-MM-DD.

weather_filename.description: Name of weather file in EPW format.

tariff_filename.description: Name of utility tariff file in IDF or URDB format.
